project.title: Welcome to the ita-profiles-frontend project
project.description: Frontend part of the ita-profiles project

exceptions.could_not_create_jwt: It was not possible to generate the JWT using Passport for the user with ID %id
exceptions.invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials provided by the user.
exceptions.language_already_exists: Language %language already exists in student profile %student
exceptions.language_not_found: This language is not in the list of available languages
exceptions.project_not_found: No project found with this ID: %projectId
exceptions.resume_not_found: No resume found for student id: %studentId
exceptions.student_language_resume_not_found: Language with id: %languageId not found for student with id: %studentId
exceptions.student_not_found: No student was found with this ID: %studentId
exceptions.tag_not_found: No tags found with this ID: %tagId
exceptions.user_not_found: No user was found with this ID: %userDNI
exceptions.user_not_found_in_redis: It was not possible to find the JWT in Redis for the user with ID %s
exceptions.user_not_stored_in_redis: Failed to store JWT in Redis for user with ID %s
